subject: RE: [junit] Little Help Please:  Could not invoke the suite() method  Error
msgSnippet: Spend 5 minutes running it under any debugger worth its salt to uncover the root of the problem. If you don t have one, the VA Java debugger is excellent.
messageBody:
Spend 5 minutes running it under any debugger worth its salt to uncover the
root of the problem. If you don't have one, the VA Java debugger is
excellent.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Vladimir Bossicard [mailto:vladimir@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 15, 2001 12:04 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [junit] Little Help Please: Could not invoke the suite()
> method Error
>
>
> Hi Paul,
>
> If you take a look at the file 'BaseTestRunner.java' you'll see that the
> test runner did found the suite() method of your class but can't invoke
> it. Just guessing :
>
> - is your suite method public?
> - does your suite method have no argument?
>
> -Vladimir
>
> > This is driving us nuts. We're running our main test suite via the
> > junit.textui.TestRunner class. We're getting an error "Could not
> > invoke the suite() method."
>
